p: The essential oils of leaves were more homogeneous compared to those derived from berries. In order to investigate statistically possible ecological influences on genotype differences and consequent essential oils compositions, we compared data (obtained using the same analytical methods) on the composition of essential oils from leaves and berries obtained from the same selections [ 4]. The software employed was “SIMCA” (see Materials and Methods), and we used a method based on PCA for classification and OPLS-DA for discriminatory analysis.
